name: Madness on Rails!
description:
Escape the cave using your skills.
An amazing and treacherous journey awaits you. Will you manage to escape safely?

Get all the coins you can and get bonus items while dodging obstacles of this treacherous cave.
Unlock new cars, share your stats and compare them with your friends. Top the leaderboards!
Enjoy the cave while moving your phone to all sides.
You won't be able to keep your head still while playing!.
